# milesPerHour

**Type Property**

The miles per hour unit of speed.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying class var milesPerHour: UnitSpeed { get }
```

## Accessing Predefined Units

- **metersPerSecond**: The meter per second unit of speed.
- **kilometersPerHour**: The kilometers per hour unit of speed.
- **knots**: The knots unit of speed.
